relations.Subject: energy storage
relations.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

Deep learning is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on training artificial neural networks with multiple layers to learn and make predictions from large amounts of data. It is particularly effective in tasks such as image and speech recognition.
relations.Subject: deep learning

relations.Description: Neural networks are a key component of generative AI, as they are used to model and simulate the behavior of the human brain. They consist of interconnected nodes (neurons) that process and transmit information to generate outputs.
relations.Subject: neural networks

relations.Description: Machine learning is an essential aspect of generative AI, as it enables the system to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. It involves the development of algorithms and models that can analyze and interpret data to make predictions or take actions.
relations.Subject: machine learning

relations.Description: Natural language processing (NLP) is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language. It involves techniques such as text analysis, sentiment analysis, and language translation.
relations.Subject: natural language processing

relations.Description: Computer vision is a subfield of generative AI that deals with enabling computers to understand and interpret visual information from images or videos. It involves tasks such as object recognition, image classification, and image generation.
relations.Subject: computer vision
